short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drag and drop items to form input fields

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add keywords from popup to page content and then drag and drop keywords to form input fields. Enhances form filling. Addition features are URL whitelist on which extension is enabled and saving/retrieving data from database. User can easily sync data between different browsers
